game.shortDescription: Ushering in a new era for the METAL GEAR franchise with cutting-edge technology powered by the Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain, will provide players a first-rate gaming experience as they are offered tactical freedom to carry out open-world missions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ushering in a new era for the METAL GEAR franchise with cutting-edge technology powered by the Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain, will provide players a first-rate gaming experience as they are offered tactical freedom to carry out open-world missions.

reviewHighlights.text: 1장은 다 깼는데 2장에서 1장 미션 고난이도로 재탕하니까 갑자기 팍 식어서 그냥 자체적으로 엔딩~ 하고 끝냈습니다... 고난이도 버전 미션은 선택적으로 하게 해줬어야지 이걸 무조건 하게 만들면 우짜라는 겁니까..
